resources.string: I\'m fine! What are you doing ?
I\'m preparing for FPT Education\'s 2022 Hackathon.
Are you also in this program?
May I ask you a few questions?
D. Private Key to Public Key
OH...! This question is so familiar that I can immediately answer it as a B.
Then let\'s raise the difficulty a little bit!
What is the name of the first academic paper that describes bitcoin commonly referred to as?
Hmm...I need some time to think.
I\'m not sure about the title of the article but I know it was written by Mr. Satoshi Nakamoto - Japan.
My final answer is answer A.
Oh no, you got the answer wrong. The correct answer is B.
No problem, it\'s a new knowledge we need to learn and absorb.
Thank you for chatting with me! See you at the Hackathon!
